transArray.content: The hotel environment is good. There is also a smart phone in the room for communication. The front desk service is very good and very welcoming. There are many shared bicycles at the door, which is very convenient for going out. There is a convenience store next to it, which is also very convenient for shopping.

Dear family, your satisfaction is refreshing because of the spring breeze and Buddha's face. Because of your satisfaction, we have the motivation to make unremitting efforts and make us make more progress.
